definitions.definition: A piece of meat suited to roasting ; meat that has been roasted.
examples: Serve the roast with gravy and mashed potatoes.

definitions.definition: A meal consisting of roast foods .
examples: Come over this weekend for Sunday roast .

definitions.definition: The degree to which something, especially coffee , is roasted .
examples: Dark roast means that the coffee bean has been roasted to a higher temperature and for a longer period of time than in light roast .

definitions.definition: An instance of being severely admonished, criticized, roasted.
A comical event , originally fraternal , where a person is subjected to verbal attack , yet may be praised by sarcasm and jokes .
A social event at which food is roasted and eaten.
examples: On Memorial Day we hosted a wiener roast in the backyard.

definitions.definition: A creative insult as a response to something someone said.

main_definition: A piece of meat suited to roasting ; meat that has been roasted.
secondary_definitions: A meal consisting of roast foods .
The degree to which something, especially coffee , is roasted .
An instance of being severely admonished, criticized, roasted. [from 18th century]
A comical event , originally fraternal , where a person is subjected to verbal attack , yet may be praised by sarcasm and jokes .
( Canada , US ) A social event at which food is roasted and eaten. [from 19th century]
( slang ) A creative insult as a response to something someone said.
